summary:
Selena is a powerful companion, no other mods are required.
Her voice is taken from other parts of the game, so she always has dialogue when you talk to her.
You can find her in the The Bannered Mare, she'll either be standing or sitting in the back.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]You can find Selena The Wolf in [b][u]The Bannered Mare[/u][/b], sitting in the back at the table, or standing next to it.
Go up to her and talk to her, and she can be recruited right away.
If she doesn't want to follow you, ask her to leave your service, and then hire her again, and it should fix it.
She's essential, so there's no concern about dying, and she's a human, so if you're using follower mods that allow you to turn her into a beast (Vampire/Werewolf), you can do so!

Personally I recommend installing these mods, to improve the experience, not just with Selena, but the other female companions in mods/vanilla.
[/size][size=4]Thieves Guild Duelist Armor CBBEv3 Echo - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13646/?
[/size][size=4]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?[/size]
author: B1gw1nn3r
